TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted. You get a TI-95. Need I say more?

I wish for my very own enigma. Those things are fascinating.

Granted, you get an enigma, it very puzzling. So puzzling that you jumped of a skyscraper.

I wish that i had a 10000000000 $

Granted, but the government gets most of it in income taxes.

I wish I had 20/20 vision!

Granted. but due to the increased vision,your eyes pop out.

i wish for to get in hogwarts

Granted. You aren't a wizard and you get flushed down the toilet by other students.

I wish for a resizable screen.

Granted. You manage to reize it to a size where you can no longer resize it (Too small) and it is lost forever.

I wish to stronk.

Granted. You tell the world that "aerofols is best countrry. aerofols stronk. gib clay or die". You do this so much that you annoy the USA and Russia and they team up and anschluss you.

I wish for a telephone

Granted.

I wish to never have this in my life.

Granted. you never have that giant cellphone. instead, you get a giant pig about to crush your house.

I wish that i could have a giant pot of gold.

Granted, but you have to reach the end of the rainbow to get it.

I wish the guy playing really loud music in the building opposite would SHUT UP!!!

granted, but it was his computer making the music. so the music stays on

i wish for an inert GBU-32

Granted, insted of getting it through package, it gets transported by jet, then dropping it on your house.

I wish I had a model jet-wing fighter.

gramnted, but your model pilots attack you, killing you.

I wish I could fly

granted. you fly into a cliff

i wish for a broken big red button.

Granted. It was a friendly big red button, which would have granted you any wish (non-corrupted). Shame it's broken.

I wish for a batch of delicious pancakes.

granted, but there are so many you blow up before you can finish!

I wish I had a better avatar than I do...

Granted. You get a new and better avatar, but it doesn't help your signature which needs improvement. As a result, your signature becomes pertinent and changes your avatar to something crappy.

I wish for a snowy owl.

Granted, it tries to peck out your eyeballs. Too graphic?

I wish for a combustible lemon.

Granted. its heading toward your face launched from the Aperture Science Hand-Held Combustible Lemon Launcher. (ASHCLL)look it up if you dont know what that is

i wish for invisitext

ERROR_404: Wish Not Found.

I wish there was no such thing as ERROR_404

Granted, but instead ERROR 404 is replaced by ERROR INVISITEXT

i wish ppl would read invisitext

Just did...but no one is able to read it as it is so invisible that the post does not even exist!

I wish we had a mod to add the ships from the tv series: Space Battleship Yamato into the KSP game!

Granted. The ships explode spontaneously on vessel load.

I wish for medicine to be cheaper.

EDIT: Ninja'd.

It gets cheaper and cheaper and cheaper.

I wish you had not wished for this as my arthritis is now getting worse by the day.

I wish for it as well.

I wish for kerbals to be sentient, with memories, personalities, ethics, morals and hopefully an attitude.
